items.content_html: LiveReloadServer is a lightweight and powerful Node.js CLI tool designed for developers who work on vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript projects. It enables real-time live reloading and serves your local projects over the network with a QR code for easy access on multiple devices.
items.title: TheKicker/Live-Reload-Server: LiveReloadServer is a lightweight and powerful Node.js CLI tool designed for developers who work on vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript projects. It enables real-time live reloading and serves your local projects over the network with a QR code for easy access on multiple devices.
